text: The Roma Nomentana railway station is a railway station in Rome located between the African quarter and the neighborhood Monte Sacro, connected to each other by a pedestrian underpass.The station and exchange car park can be accessed from via Valle d'Aosta, a road located between Via Nomentana and via delle Valli. == History == The station was opened on 25 November 1983.Cruciani, op. cit., p. 23 == References == ==External links== Nomentana Category:Railway stations opened in 1983 Category:Rome Q. XVI Monte Sacro Category:Rome Q. XVII Trieste Category:1983 establishments in Italy
title: Roma Nomentana railway station
